data.eml:eml: Taxonomic revision of Myrmeciza (Aves: Passeriformes: Thamnophilidae) into 12 genera based on phylogenetic, morphological, behavioral, and ecological data

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Isler, Morton L., Bravo, Gustavo A., Brumfield, Robb T. (2013): Taxonomic revision of Myrmeciza (Aves: Passeriformes: Thamnophilidae) into 12 genera based on phylogenetic, morphological, behavioral, and ecological data. Zootaxa 3717 (4): 469-497, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3717.4.3
